channel.description: Recent content in scrum on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Our Daily Standup Format
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Report Template Team: Your team Yesterday + [Task ID] : What did you work on the task yesterday and what is the status of the task + The other things (no name tasks) that you worked on or participated in Today + [Task ID]: What are you going to work on today? + The other things (no name tasks) that you are going to work or participate in Blockers + [Task ID]: What is blocking you?
